verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A longing stirs in my soul
Draws me near, calls me close
Deeper into this love
That won't run out, won't dry up

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Oh, let it rain
Oh, let it rain

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let Your glory fall
Overwhelm my soul
Let Your presence flood my life,
O Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Deep is calling to deep
Revival's tide breaking free
Jesus, reign in this place
Thirsty we cry, Heaven invade

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Let Your glory fall
Overwhelm my soul
Let Your presence flood my life,
O Lord
Break upon me now
Let Your love crash down
Let Your glory fall
Let Your glory fall
